marklogic.body: 11 years gives you visitor status...the rest of us remember what a real working waterfront is and what we currently have is just an echo of a time long gone by.Â During Fiesta, all the boats in flying their flags, no room in the harbor for all of them!Â My special outfits, all my Italian friends decked out in white as if for a wedding!Â Retrieving my uncle from Joe's Dug Out or the Old Timers back when they were the bars of the Fisherman, not the troublemakers.Â My cousin and I would sit in the back sipping Cold while waiting for my Uncle to finishÂ drinking.Â The fisherman loved to seeÂ us and Always came to chat.....police never caught us.Â Suzanne, you know nothing, nothing of this town as evidenced by your uniformed letter.
